NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Influence or the cell corresponding to Music and Preservation?

NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Music} and {Localization} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.48 to 0.49?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Literature, Adoption), (Art, Commercialization), (Cuisine, Commercialization), (Art, Diversity), (Cuisine, Diversity), (Literature, Diversity), (Music, Diversity), (Travel, Diversity), (Art, Influence), (Travel, Innovation), (Cuisine, Popularity), (Social Media, Popularity), (TV Shows, Popularity), (Cuisine, Preservation)}.
